
#Getting & Cleaning Data Project

* This R script can be used to modify the source project to dataset to present only the file describes how to tidy the source data to include only the mean and std deviation measurements.

* This script will automatically download and extract the source file if you are on the Windows platform.  

* If you use Linux or Mac, you may will want to first download the source file from https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip.  Unzip the archive so that the UCI HAR Dataset folder is in your R working directory.

* Run the run_analysis.R script to produce tidy.txt.

* The codebook.md file provides more information on the data and variables.
